title: Magic Video Capture/Convert/Burn Studio 8.0.8.25-serial incl
description:
Convert video, capture video, and burn DVD	Magic Video Capture/Convert/Burn Studio is refined as a premier video solution. Video Capture, edit, Convert and Burn are all supported by this powerful tool. Using the latest technology, Magic Video Capture/Convert/Burn Studio is outstanding both in high-speed and picture clarity.

Not only can you capture your memories from your DV or other video devices but also edit videos and burn them to DVD. You can even convert videos to the format required for a website. Within 4-steps, Magic Video Capture/Convert/Burn Studio will express your creative ideas and share them with your friends.

Features 
Capture Video, Audio and Images. 
Burn video on DVD and create DVD burning menu.
Convert your movies in batch mode. 
Convert and split all most-used videos.
Customize video screen size, audio/video bit rate, frame rate, aspect;
And much more! 

The software is very user-friendly according to our 10, 000 users, as they selected ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œEasy-to-useÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ as the No. 1 feature in a recent survey. 

Video batch conversion

Well, 20 hours movie may take several hours to convert, and you don't have to be sitting and waiting. Just add all AVI files you want to convert, Magic Video Studio will convert these files automatically.


System Requirements 
Processor type: Pentium 
Processor speed: 233 MHz 
Memory (Cache): 64 MB RAM Minimum 
Hard disk: IDE 
Operating system: Windows 98/2000/XP/2003/Vista 
Soundcard: MME-compatible Soundcard 
Graphics: 256 colors @ 800 x 600
